summary: The customer was looking for a more reliable and durable phone than the one they purchased from Contoso Wireless. The agent suggested the Contoso X10, which is a powerful and waterproof model with a two-year warranty. The customer decided to purchase the blue version of the phone, which retails for $399.99 USD. The agent informed the customer that their order will be shipped with free standard shipping and should arrive within 5-7 business days.
